ESP.ORIGINAL: PLAYER PICKPOCKET
Anything that touches me, I cut off. Remember that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 任何触碰我的东西，我都会斩断。记住这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_PLAYERPICKPOCKET_00009E28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stand up, gringo.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_PLAYERPICKPOCKET_00009E29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shall I pretend you're not right there?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_PLAYERPICKPOCKET_00009E2A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mine, not yours.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_PLAYERPICKPOCKET_00009E2B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Puta... you look like a fool.
ESP.TRADUIT: 逼养的...你看起来像个傻瓜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_PLAYERPICKPOCKET_00009E2C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, a grenade. I've already removed the pin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，一枚手榴弹，我已经拔掉了保险针。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_PLAYERPICKPOCKET_00009E2D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: GREETING
This is kinda awkward, but... I got a favour to ask.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这有点尴尬，但是...我想请你帮个忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_GREETING_0000A89C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing less than he deserves.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_GREETING_0000B22A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are we buying? Word has it Ike's got some old southern tequila stashed away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要买什么?听说艾克藏了一些南方龙舌兰酒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_GREETING_0000BBAA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I don't have any more chems for you than I did her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我给你的药不比给她的多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [040020E1] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaFollowersVT\RosaIntro_GREETING_00004229_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd appreciate it if we didn't have any more guns waving around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们不要再拿枪晃来晃去，我会很感激的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [040020E1] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaFollowersVT\RosaIntro_GREETING_0000422A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the last time I do a run through the Mojave...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是我最后一次在莫哈韦沙漠里奔跑…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [040020E1] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaFollowersVT\RosaIntro_GREETING_0000422B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The fuck are you looking at?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_GREETING_0000422C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You didn't have to do that, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不必这么做的，你知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [040020E1] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaFollowersVT\RosaIntro_GREETING_000046F9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Greetings, friend. I'd shake your hand, but I'm a bit tied up at the moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好,朋友。我很想和你握手，但是我现在有点忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [040020E1] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaFollowersVT\RosaIntro_GREETING_00004700_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, no... don't let me interrupt you! You were having a nice old chat over there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,不...别让我打断你!你们在那边聊得很开心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_GREETING_00004715_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you fucking stupid, gringo? What the fuck was that?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈傻吗，美国佬?那是什么鬼东西?!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_GREETING_0000473E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck off already. This headache's bad enough without you yammering in my ear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚开。你在我耳边唠叨已经够头疼的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_GREETING_00004747_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah? What are you looking at?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_GREETING_00004746_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, no... we're not doing this again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,不...我们不能再这样了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_GREETING_00004748_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, well... if it isn't my old friend from down at Ivanpah. Stuck your beak into anyone else's business lately?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯,嗯...这不是我在伊凡帕的老朋友吗你最近多管闲事了吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_GREETING_00004749_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, before we go any further, we gotta talk about that stash of yours. I haven't come all this way for nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，在我们继续之前，我们得谈谈你那批货。我可不是白跑这一趟的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_GREETING_00005F0B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... thrown your lot in with Caesar, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...把你的命运交给凯撒，是吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_GREETING_0000941C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pinche... why'd you have to go and get the Republic's attention?
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死...你为什么要去引起共和国的注意?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_GREETING_0000941D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No time for talk, amigo! We've got a battle to win!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn... full raider, huh? I knew you had it in you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的...全副武装，是吧?我就知道你有这个本事!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009435_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Powder Gangers, huh? Let's hope we don't get blown up in the process.
ESP.TRADUIT: 炸药帮，是吧?希望我们不会在这个过程中被炸飞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009436_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Puta... come on, you can do much better than them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 贱人...来吧，你可以做得比他们好得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009437_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... we getting paid extra, or what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...我们会得到额外的报酬，还是怎样?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009438_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, there's worse things than having some power armoured maniacs on our side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有比让一群全副武装的疯子站在我们这边更糟糕的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009439_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wouldn't mind one of those long-range cannons myself, actually. What do you reckon the chances are of sneaking one out of there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 其实我挺想要一把远程大炮的。你觉得我们有多大可能偷偷拿走一把？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_0000943A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm begging you, whatever you do, don't break out in some hip-swaying dance, alright?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我求你了，不管你做什么，都不要突然跳起摇臀舞，好吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_0000943B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that's going to complicate things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，这会让事情变得复杂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_0000943C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bunch of two-faced snakes. Get your caps and get out... trust me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一群双面蛇。拿走你的瓶盖，出去...相信我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_0000943D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do I get the feeling we're not wanted here...
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么我觉得这里不需要我们?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_0000943E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great... more mutants.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_0000943F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Geez... the NCR really went all out, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊...NCR真的全力以赴了，是吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009440_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, uh... this is cosy.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009441_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What better place to see the real frontline. It's kinda pathetic really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有比这更好的地方能看到真正的前线吗。这真的有点可悲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_0000945A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mierda... what happened to this place?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_0000945B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This has setup written all over it. Not exactly subtle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这明显是早有预谋的。并不怎么隐蔽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_0000945C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know... I reckon the dinosaur's kinda cute.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道...我觉得恐龙挺可爱的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_0000945D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey doc! Still breathing? I have those caps I owe you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨,医生!还活着吗?这些瓶盖是我欠你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_0000945E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Home, sweet... Freeside?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_0000945F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's hope no one recognises me...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009460_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's this place even for, anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方到底是干什么用的?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_0000991A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, yeah... stare away, assholes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,是的...盯着看，混蛋们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_0000991B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There she is. Kinda underwhelming really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她来了。真的有点平淡无奇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_0000991C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't trust mutants. Just so you know, they try anything, all bets are off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不相信变种人。你要知道，他们什么事都做得出来，一切都不作数。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_0000991D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't mind being the centre of attention, but... not like this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不介意成为大家关注的焦点，但是...不是这样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_0000991E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There he is. What a sad, little old man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他来了。多么悲伤的小老头啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_0000991F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice! I could get used to this.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009920_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dios mio... I guess we already know who's responsible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的天啊...我想我们已经知道是谁干的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009921_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The old lady's got a lot of fight left in her. Respect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这老太太还挺有斗志的。我尊重她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009922_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh boy... here we go.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009923_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eyes open. This is Fiend territory now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 眼睛睁开。现在这里是恶魔帮的地盘了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009924_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good to see Lucy's still kicking. You should try out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴看到露西还活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009925_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The hell happened here?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009926_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sarah, was it? She's kinda cute.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009927_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ¡Hola, coños! I'm home... and no, I'm not coming back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊!我到家了...不，我不会回来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009928_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone tell Cook-Cook that I hope he dies in a fire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁去告诉库克，我希望他死在火里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009929_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So long, bitch.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_0000992A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Motor died as he lived: pathetic.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_0000992B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some NCR rangers will be breathing easier now for sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一些NCR游骑兵现在肯定可以松一口气了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_0000992C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's always something, isn't there?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DE6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Novac ain't far, but my guess is your guy's already gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 诺瓦奇离这儿不远，但我猜你们的人已经走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DE7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ready when you are. I can help you get him outta there alive if you want to make it last. Sounds like you two have some... unfinished business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备好了叫我。如果你想让他活命，我可以帮你把他弄出来。 听起来你们两个有些未了的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DE8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good riddance.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DE9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So much for things getting easier.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DEA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aww... I was expecting something more fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢...我还以为会更有趣呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DEB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take that, you stuffshirt piece of shit.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DEC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here we go. Let's make it a fight to remember, eh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 开始吧。让我们来一场难忘的战斗，好吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was easy.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DEE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mierda... you want to make those tin cans more powerful?
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的...你想让那些锡罐更强大吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DEF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The old man plays the long game, I'll give him that much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个老头打的是持久战，这点我佩服他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DF0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, shit. That didn't work out too well.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DF1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's for the best, trust me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样对大家都好，相信我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DF2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do what you gotta do, all I'm saying is... you're playing with fire here, cabrón.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做你该做的，我只是说...你这是在玩火。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DF3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, well... never thought I'd see the day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯,嗯...从没想过会有这么一天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DF4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's one crisis averted.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DF5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't say the guy didn't have it coming. Oh well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不能说这家伙是自作自受。哦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DF6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are our chances of being collared or flayed the moment we step foot inside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们一踏进家门就被抓住或剥皮的几率有多大?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DF7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Brutal... but you gotta do what you gotta do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 残酷...但你得做你该做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DF8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now there's an alliance I wasn't expecting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在有了一个我没想到的联盟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DF9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: About time someone got rid of 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该有人把他们处理掉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DFA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please... please don't fuck this up. I wanna leave here alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请...请不要搞砸了。我想活着离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DFB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mierda... I can finally breathe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的...我终于可以呼吸了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DFC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Puta madre... this is gonna be tough. Weapon's at the ready!
ESP.TRADUIT: 混蛋...这将会很艰难。武器准备好了!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DFD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So much for diplomacy.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DFE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Motor-Runner doesn't need any more chems, believe me... but I could always take that off your hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 机车手不需要更多的化学药品了，相信我...但我可以帮你搞定
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009DFF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's always the ants, isn't it? Stupid bugs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总是有蚂蚁，不是吗?愚蠢的错误。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009E00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll be a medic at this rate. At least they'll get to wake up to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 照这样下去，你会成为一名医生的。至少他们会在我面前醒来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009E01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, didn't you know the Gloves were cannibals? They do such a poor job hiding it, thought it was widely known by now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你不知道白手套们是食人族吗？他们隐藏得这么差劲，我还以为现在已经广为人知了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009E02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bring it on, boys. I'll have Caesar's head on a spike.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，孩子们。我会把凯撒的头钉在钉子上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009E03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The one with the spiked hair recognised you. I'd make it a slow death, if I was you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 留着尖刺头发的那个认出了你。如果我是你，我会让他慢慢死去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009E04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I'm just getting soft, but... we should help those lovebirds out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许是我太软弱了，但是...我们应该帮助那些情侣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009E05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... so much for that idea.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009E06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion always were mean sons of bitches. And that's coming from me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团一直都是些卑鄙的混蛋。这就是我想说的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009E07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just when I thought we were all full up with crazy...
ESP.TRADUIT: 正当我以为大家都疯了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009E08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mierda... more errands?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009E0A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Godspeed, freaks.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009E09_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Finally... I thought she would never shut up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后...我以为她永远不会闭嘴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009E0B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget 'em... the Republic's doomed as it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 忘记他们…共和国就这样完蛋了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009E0C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice! I wouldn't mind some power armour myself... ever seen someone smash through a wall at full speed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好!我自己也不介意有动力装甲...你见过全速撞墙的人吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009E0D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you wasting your time with these nobodies?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要在这些无名小卒身上浪费时间?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009E0E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We finished with this whole runaround yet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们结束这场闹剧了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009E0F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn... there goes my dress again.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009E10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This Father Elijah guy sounds like a real piece of work. You should introduce us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个以利亚神父听起来很厉害。你应该介绍我们认识。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009E11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good boy! Got you all fixed up, didn't we? Yes, we did! Good dog...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好孩子!把你都治好了，不是吗?是的，我们做到了!好狗...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009E12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't envy the guy. Might've been Republic, but that's brutal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不羡慕那家伙。可能是共和国的人，但这太残忍了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009E13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fantastic, huh? Who put this pinche in charge?
ESP.TRADUIT: 神奇吧?谁让这个小人物掌权的?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009E14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dios mio... they might actually make this rustbucket fly!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的天啊...他们可能会让这个铁桶飞起来!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009E15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lo siento, soldier. You did your duty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见，士兵。你尽了你的责任。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_IdleChatter_00009E16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack
Come and get me!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_Attack_0000A8B0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna make a meal outta those brahmin!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把那些双头牛做成一顿饭!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_Attack_0000A8B1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You poor, stupid dog...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_Attack_0000A8B2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's finish this, you crazy bastard!
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们结束这一切，你这个疯狂的混蛋!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_Attack_0000A8B3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come and get me, big guy!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E46_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think I'm afraid of you? Ha!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E47_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crawl back to whatever hole you came out of!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E48_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on! I can do this all day!
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧!我可以坚持一整天!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E49_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: More zombies... great.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E4A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dios, you really are disgusting...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E4B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try again!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E4C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come here, you stupid bug...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E4D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Venom makes it more fun!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E4E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You big, stupid lizard!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E4F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come here, mama... time to dance!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eat this!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is nothing compared to the Baja...
ESP.TRADUIT: 与巴哈相比，这根本不算什么...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll rip your stinger off with my teeth!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要用牙齿把你的毒刺扯下来!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Piss off!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I almost feel bad putting it down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我都不好意思把它放下了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E55_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: More dogs.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't let 'em surround you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come here, you little bastard.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Disgusting.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meat for the fire.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E5A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: More goddamn lizards...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E5B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch it doesn't breathe fire!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E5C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First you and then your eggs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先是你，然后是你的蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E5D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everywhere I go, I swear...
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论我走到哪里，我发誓…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E5E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Parásitos.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E5F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, kitty, kitty.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Another one bites the dust!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E61_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're hardly worth the bullet.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E62_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What hole did you crawl out from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是从哪个洞里爬出来的?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me show you how it's done!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E65_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell Caesar I'm coming for him next.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉凯撒，我下一个去找他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E64_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ain't your slave, pal.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not this time, boys!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E67_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go fuck yourself.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E68_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Run back to the Boneyard!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck off. You and your army.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E6A_1.ogg

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E6B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ain't throwing me in jail!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E6C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck me...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Attack_00009E6D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come here, you stupid robot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 过来，你这个愚蠢的机器人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm coming for House next!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Psshhh... I could do this with my eyes shut.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do me a favour... don't get back up.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack any enemies on sight. Don't hold back.

ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你现在回幸运38赌场去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you make it outta here in one piece.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck it... no time to lose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的...不能再浪费时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_UsedDoctorBag_00009EDD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, yeah... you don't need to coddle me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,是的...你不需要娇惯我!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_UsedDoctorBag_00009EDE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm fine - thanks for asking.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_UsedDoctorBag_00009EDF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should see the other guy.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_UsedDoctorBag_00009EE0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crippled
I'm... fine...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Crippled_00009E89_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Breathe, Rosa... breathe...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Crippled_00009E8A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Laugh it up, gringo...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Crippled_00009E8B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... won't break...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Crippled_00009E8C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone get me a doctor... quickly...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Crippled_00009E8D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Puta... this hurts like hell...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Crippled_00009E8E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_KnockedBack_00009EBD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm... all right...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_KnockedBack_00009EBE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You won't get another chance!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_KnockedBack_00009EBF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still breathing.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_KnockedBack_00009EC0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You just made me angrier!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_KnockedBack_00009EC1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need to cheat, huh?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_KnockedBack_00009EC2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regenerating
Here I come!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Regenerating_00009ED5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's rock!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Regenerating_00009ED6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back in action, fuckers!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Regenerating_00009ED7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just getting started!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Regenerating_00009ED8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on! Show me what you got!
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧!让我看看你有什么本事!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Regenerating_00009ED9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back for round two, idiota!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Regenerating_00009EDA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't just stand there... do something!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别光站在那儿...做点什么!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_OnFire_00009EC9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Put it out, damn it!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_OnFire_00009ECA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mierda! I'm on fire!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_OnFire_00009ECB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Wincing, in pain.]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_OnFire_00009ECC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bad move.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_OnFire_00009ECD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay... now you're gonna get it.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_OnFire_00009ECE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Poison
G-Gringo? Is... is that you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Poisoned_00009ECF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maldito... where... is everyone...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Poisoned_00009ED0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aie... I think I've been poisoned...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Poisoned_00009ED1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need... antivenom... something... urgh...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要...抗蛇毒血清...什么...呃...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Poisoned_00009ED2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hate the desert...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Poisoned_00009ED3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need to... sit down... rest...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_Poisoned_00009ED4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, cabrón! I know you can hear me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，伙计!我知道你能听到我说话!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_FollowersOverbur_000085A7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay... something just broke.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_FollowersOverbur_000085A8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You asshole. This shit ain't mine!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你混蛋。这东西不是我的!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_FollowersOverbur_000085A9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Little help here?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_FollowersOverbur_000085AA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oi, gringo! Come and take some of this crap already!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，美国佬！来把这些破烂拿走！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_FollowersOverbur_000085AB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any further and I'm gonna start throwing stuff away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再往前走，我就把东西扔了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_FollowersOverbur_000085AC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mierda... I'm not your fucking packhorse!
ESP.TRADUIT: 混蛋...我他妈的不是你的牲口！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_FollowersOverbur_000085AD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Too easy.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_FollowersStealth_000085AE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say good night...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_FollowersStealth_000085AF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, it'd be easier if we just charged in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，我们直接冲进去会更容易些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_FollowersStealth_000085B0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And along came a spider.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_FollowersStealth_000085B1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let mama handle this.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_FollowersStealth_000085B2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They won't even see it coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们甚至看不到它的到来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_FollowersStealth_000085B3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This kitty has claws...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_FollowersStealth_000085B4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got your back.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_FollowersStealth_000085B5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone who's apparently been ballroom dancing with a Deathclaw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个显然和死亡爪跳过舞的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Funny. You come all this way for that, or do I have to shoot you too?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有趣。你大老远跑来就是为了这个，要不我也把你毙了?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroInit1A_0000422E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, don't mind me... I'm just here to admire the scenery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，别管我...我只是来这里欣赏风景的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cute. I hate cute.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroInit1B_00004230_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep that up and you'll be staring down a double-barrel in no time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再这样，你很快就会看到两把枪对着你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oooh, got some spirit, have we? I wouldn't mind sparring with you, cabrón, but now ain't it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，有点精神头啊，是吧？我倒是不介意和你较量一番，老兄，但现在可不行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroInit1C_00004232_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's going on here?
What do you think? Stimpaks, that's what. All this for some lousy do-gooder and a bag of stims.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得呢？治疗针，就这些。所有的这一切就是为了一个无用的空想者和一袋治疗针。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroInit2_00004234_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dios mio... it wasn't supposed to go like that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的天啊...不应该是这样的!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroInit2_00004234_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take it easy. Why don't you start from the beginning?
ESP.TRADUIT: 别紧张。你为什么不从头开始呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, sure... whatever. A little bird told me those Bible-thumping wackjobs in Freeside were running some kind of outreach shit down south.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，当然...随便吧。有只小鸟告诉我，自由城那些圣经不离口的疯子在南边进行某种什么宣传。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroInit3_00004236_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cause I ain't one to ever miss the fireworks, I figured relieving them of their supplies would do nicely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我一向不会错过烟花，我琢磨着抢他们的补给品是个不错的选择
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroInit3_00004236_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see not everything went according to plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看不是一切都按计划进行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plan? Who said anything about a plan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 计划吗?谁说有什么计划了?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroInit4_00004238_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I go where the wind takes me, gringo. Anyone who's stupid enough to get shot, that's their problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我随风而行，美国佬。谁蠢到挨枪子儿，那是他们自己的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroInit4_00004238_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the story with him?
Puta madre... not even a whiff of Jet on him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 贱人...他身上连一点杰特的味道都没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroInit5_0000423A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... what? He'll just conjure drugs for you out of thin air?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以呢？他能凭空变毒品给你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No... I left one alive. She's gone to scrounge up a little something for me as payment. What do you think I am, stupid?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不…我留了一个活口。她去给我弄点东西作为报酬了。你以为我是什么，笨蛋?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroInit6_0000423C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me talk to him.
Fine, fine... but no torturing him, okay? And no sudden movements!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧...但别折磨他，好吗？不要突然动！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroInit7_0000423E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She had a gun pointed directly at you.
And yet, she could still be reasoned with.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [040020E1] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaFollowersVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathA1_000046FA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can we be any better than Fiends if we only resort to violence?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们只诉诸暴力，我们又比恶魔帮好到哪里去呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [040020E1] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaFollowersVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathA1_000046FA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get out of here, doc. Go back to your people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离开这里，医生。回到你的同胞中去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't mean to sound ungrateful... I do appreciate your help, but I cannot forgive you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是有意忘恩负义...我真的很感激你的帮助，但我不能原谅你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [040020E1] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaFollowersVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathA2_000046FC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, try to do better. We must all be better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，努力变得更好。我们都必须变得更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [040020E1] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaFollowersVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathA2_000046FC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the-- Hey, that's my meal ticket, damn it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 搞什么，这是我的饭票，该死!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathB1_000046FE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem remarkably calm for someone in your position.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于你目前所处的位置来说，你看起来出奇地冷静。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's already been enough bloodshed. I'm doing my best not to add to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 已经流了足够的血了。我尽力不增加伤亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [040020E1] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaFollowersVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathC1_00004702_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me your side of the story.
I am one of the Followers of the Apocalypse, a... charity, if you like, run from the old fort in Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是天启追随者的一员，如果你愿意，你可以认为我们是一个慈善组织，从拉斯维加斯的老要塞起家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [040020E1] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaFollowersVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathC2_00004704_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've been hoping to establish supply lines in the wasteland, or outreach like our friend there said.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们一直在希望能在废土上建立一条补给线，或者像那边的朋友所说的那样进行推广。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [040020E1] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaFollowersVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathC2_00004704_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you get mixed up in all this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么会卷入这一切的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was heading up the highway to Goodsprings before planning to make the trek across to the 188.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本来打算沿着公路前往清泉镇，然后再徒步前往188号避难所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [040020E1] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaFollowersVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathC3_00004706_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately, we were... waylaid. I think you can surmise the rest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，我们...被伏击了。剩下的你应该能猜到了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [040020E1] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaFollowersVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathC3_00004706_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I passed through Goodsprings not too long ago. Doc Mitchell doesn't need the help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不久前我经过清泉镇， 米切尔医生并不需要帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's good to hear, but we'd still like to help in any way we can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴听你这么说，但我们还是愿意尽我们所能提供帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [040020E1] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaFollowersVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathC4A_00004708_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All this trouble over some Stimpaks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就因为一些治疗针，就惹出这么多麻烦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. It's our policy to not carry illicit substances, specifically to avoid situations like these.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。我们的政策是不携带违禁品，特别是为了避免发生这样的情况。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [040020E1] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaFollowersVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathC4B_0000470A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unfortunately, our friend there didn't get the memo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，那边的朋友没有收到通知。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [040020E1] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaFollowersVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathC4B_0000470A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear one of your fellows has gone for help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你们中的一个已经去找帮手了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Misha, yes. Bright girl, very compassionate, although the longer I spend here, the more I think something may have happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 米莎，是的。聪明的女孩，非常有同情心，不过我在这里待得越久，越觉得可能发生了什么事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [040020E1] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaFollowersVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathC5_0000470C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's also, uh... rather dusty. I can feel the early stages of dehydration setting in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里也...嗯...相当尘土飞扬。我感觉自己开始脱水了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [040020E1] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaFollowersVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathC5_0000470C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Offer him a drink from your canteen.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [从你的水壶里给他倒一杯饮料。]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [040020E1] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaFollowersVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathC6A_0000470E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you hoping to get out of this, exactly?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底想从中得到什么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't wish any harm on her... I only wish to leave here in peace. Ideally, with the Stimpaks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想伤害她。我只想安安静静地离开这里。最好是带着治疗针
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [040020E1] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaFollowersVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathC6B_00004710_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't have anything to offer in exchange?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没有什么可以用来交换的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only that redemption is within reach for even her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有救赎是她能得到的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [040020E1] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaFollowersVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathC7_00004712_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll see what I can do.
I sincerely believe that she's not as immoral as she thinks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真诚地相信她并不像她自己认为的那样坏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [040020E1] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaFollowersVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathC8_00004714_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He wants to be released.
And I want a motorbike that spits fire outta the exhaust, but that's not happening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还想要一辆摩托车，能从排气管喷出火焰来，但那是不可能的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB1_00004717_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Argh... come on, gringo. At least make it worth my while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唉...拜托了，美国佬。至少让我觉得值得。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB1_00004717_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let him go and I'll show you where my hidden stash is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放了他，我就告诉你我藏东西的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit yeah - now we're talking! Finally, things're getting interesting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，这才对嘛！终于有点意思了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB2_00004719_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, you can cut yourself free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来，你可以把自己解开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB2_00004719_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [200 Caps] Here, take it. Nothing's ever free, is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: [200 瓶盖] 拿去，天下没有免费的午餐，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] That can certainly sweeten the deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 这确实能让交易更有吸引力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB2_0000471B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, you heard 'em... you can go free. And keep all that gospel babble to yourself, for fuck's sake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你听到了...你可以自由了。拜托，把你那些宗教胡话留给自己吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB2_0000471B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I may be high, but I ain't blind. Actually, you know what... I think I'll just take it from your corpse.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]我也许是嗨了，但我又不瞎。事实上，你知道吗?我想我还是直接从你的尸体上拿吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB2_0000471C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave him and the Stimpaks before you really start to get on my nerves. You don't want that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你真的惹我生气之前，把他和治疗针都留下。你不会想那样的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, alright... I'm going! Take it easy, I-I was just messing around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧...我走！放松点，我只是开个玩笑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB2_0000471E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See? They're free, no harm done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，他们自由了，毫发无伤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB2_0000471E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me think about it.
You do that.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB2_00004720_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the Stimpaks?
Dios mio... fine, take 'em! No use for that tourist shit anyways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的天啊...好吧，拿去吧!反正观光客也没用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB3_00004722_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was there something else?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB3_00004722_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good choice.
Yeah, yeah... you're a real hardass. Consider it my good deed for the day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,是的...你真是个狠角色。就当这是我今天做的好事吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB3_00004724_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, we finished?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB3_00004724_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where are you headed next?
We playing twenty questions now? You got your guy, you got your stims and I ain't got jack shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们现在要玩问答游戏了吗？你的人找到了，医疗针也到手了，而我一无所有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB4_00004726_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't remember anyone asking you to take charge either! I fucking hate wastelanders...
ESP.TRADUIT: 可也没人请你来负责啊！我他妈恨透了废土人...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB4_00004726_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
Fuck you too.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB4_00004728_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should join me.
[She proceeds to laugh wildly, struggling to breathe at times.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [她继续疯狂地笑着，甚至呼吸都变得困难了。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB5_0000472A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, oh... Wait, you're serious? Why the hell would I do that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,哦...等等，你是认真的?我为什么要那么做?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB5_0000472A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Raiders travel in packs. Where's yours?
ESP.TRADUIT: 掠夺者都是成群结队的。你的同伙呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you start... it's a long story. You'll have to forgive me, cabrón, for not spilling everything on command.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别急着...说来话长。对不起，朋友，因为我没法全盘托出。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB6_0000472C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your sunny disposition can brighten my day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你阳光的性格能照亮我的一天。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wonderful... a comedian. Just when I thought this headache couldn't get any worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了...一个喜剧演员。就在我以为这头痛不会变得更糟的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB6_0000472E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you see any other options?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还看到有其他选择吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear Quarry Junction's pretty lively these days... you should head there first chance you get.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说采石场最近很热闹…你应该一有机会就先去那儿看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB6_00004730_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: From the state of the bodies over there, you seem like you can handle yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从那边尸体的状况来看，你似乎能应付得来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No shit.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB7_00004732_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you want to make the trip back to Vegas alone, be my guest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果你想要独自返回维加斯，请便。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine... just to shut you up already.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB8_00004734_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good to have you along.
I'd ask for your name, but you'll probably be dead before the day's out. Don't worry, I'll put your stuff to good use.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本想问你的名字，但你可能活不到今天日落。别担心，我会好好利用你的东西的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB9_00004736_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name's Rosa, if you must know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你一定要问的话，我叫罗莎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB9_00004736_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure we're going to be best friends in no time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信我们很快就会成为好朋友的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd ask for your name, but you'll probably be dead before the day's out. Don't worry, I'll put your stuff to good use.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本想问你的名字，但你可能活不到今天日落。别担心，我会好好利用你的东西的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB9_00004739_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name's Rosa, if you must know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你一定要问的话，我叫罗莎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB9_00004739_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't make me regret this.
I'd ask for your name, but you'll probably be dead before the day's out. Don't worry, I'll put your stuff to good use.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本想问你的名字，但你可能活不到今天日落。别担心，我会好好利用你的东西的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB9_0000473A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name's Rosa, if you must know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你一定要问的话，我叫罗莎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB9_0000473A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get out of here.
You won't hear any complaints from me.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB1_0000473C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mierda... all this sand's starting to chafe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死...这些沙子开始磨得我不舒服了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathCB1_0000473C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Problem solved.
Why'd you have to go and kill him, huh? You think I've been standing around because I feel like it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要去杀了他，嗯？你以为我是因为喜欢才一直站在这里的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathD1_0000473F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There were no chems at the end of this. Even you must know that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有药物了。连你也必须知道这一点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Estúpido y jodido Mojave y esos malditos químicos. Sabía que esto saldría mal. Dios, soy un idiota. ¡Mierda!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的莫哈维和那些该死的家伙。我知道这会出问题。天哪，我是个白痴。见鬼！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathD2_00004741_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you finished?
No! I could strangle Violet right about now, but... there isn't much I can do here, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不！我现在真想把他掐死，但...我在这里也做不了什么，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathD3_00004743_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What a fucking waste...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroPathD3_00004743_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What a fucking waste...
Who are you again?
Who am I? You, gringo, proved to be quite the pain in my ass trying to secure those chems from the Followers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是谁？你，美国佬，试图从天启追随者那里弄到那些化学品，真让我大伤脑筋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroLeave1A_0000474B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see you've moved up in the world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你在这世上混得不错嘛。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cute. Besides, you still haven't answered my question.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真可爱。不过，你还没有回答我的问题呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroLeave1B_0000474D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are a lot of reasons I'm in Vegas. None of which concern you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来拉斯维加斯有很多原因，但都和你无关。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn... that almost hurt! Let me guess: you're running errands for the Republic, right? Or the Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但都与你无关。该死...那一下可真疼！让我来猜猜：你是为共和国跑腿的吧？还是军团？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroLeave2_0000474F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take my advice, muchacho... it's best to stay outta the politics. Especially the Families.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听我的忠告，小伙子...最好远离政治。尤其是家族政治。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroLeave2_0000474F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn... that almost hurt! Let me guess: you're running errands for the Republic, right? Or the Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但都与你无关。该死...那一下可真疼！让我来猜猜：你是为共和国跑腿的吧？还是军团？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroLeave2_00004750_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take my advice, chica... it's best to stay outta the politics. Especially the Families.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听我的忠告，姑娘...最好远离政治。尤其是家族政治。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroLeave2_00004750_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure you're just the patron saint of diplomacy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我确信你一定是外交的守护神。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck no... but I made it this far, right? So have you, for whatever that's worth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不...但我走到这一步了，对吧？你也一样，不管这值不值一提。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroLeave3_00004752_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing in Gomorrah?
What do you think? Same as everyone else that comes here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得呢?和其他来这里的人一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroLeave4_00004754_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're that starved for entertainment, you could always join me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你那么渴望娱乐，可以加入我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, and pester some merchant caravans out of pocket change? You've gotta give me something here, hermano.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么，向一些商队乞讨些零钱？你得给我些什么好处，兄弟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroLeave5_00004756_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you're bored, and that you're looking for any excuse to get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为你无聊了，你在找任何借口离开这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe, maybe not. Question is, do you have what it takes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许有，也许没有。问题是，你准备好了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroLeave6_00004758_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I made it here, didn't I? Besides, you've already seen what I can do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我到这里来了，不是吗？再说，你已经看到我能做什么了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, fine! You've convinced me.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroLeave7_0000475A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me square up my tab with the boys and we can get out of here. Just... don't make me regret this, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我跟这帮家伙结个账，咱们就可以走了。只是...别让我后悔，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([04002A74]RosaIntro) By Any Other Name EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaIntro_RosaIntroLeave7_0000475A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is no magic stash of chems. I made it up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有魔法化学药箱。我编出来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Oh, for fuck's sake...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaStash1A_00005F0D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, I probably should've seen that coming, but royally screwed over twice in one day. Puta madre.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说，我本该预见到这一点的，但一天之内被耍了两次。该死的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaStash1A_00005F0D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, uh... I might've... sort've... bent the truth. A little.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我...我可能...有点...歪曲了事实。一点点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Oh, for fuck's sake...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaStash1B_00005F0E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, I probably should've seen that coming, but royally screwed over twice in one day. Puta madre.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说，我本该预见到这一点的，但一天之内被耍了两次。该死的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaStash1B_00005F0E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're here now, aren't you?
Apparently so. Not that I'm liking it much after you lied to my face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然是的。不过，你当面撒谎后，我并不是很喜欢这个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaStash2_00005F10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This from a raider.
Former raider, yeah? I don't run with that scum anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗？前掠夺者？我再也不会和那种渣滓为伍了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaStash3_00005F12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you really were part of the Fiends?
Like I said the first time, it's a long story. One I don't exactly feel like sharing right now... especially with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像我第一次说的，那是个很长的故事。我现在不想分享那个故事...尤其是和你分享。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaStash4_00005F14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That promise of some chems really got to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些化学品的承诺真的让你心动了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No shit it did... but whatever. No use kicking your teeth in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，确实是这样...但不管它了。没必要纠结于此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaStash5_00005F16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I might get some better stuff while we're out here anyway. But you owe me. Don't forget that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何，我们接下来还能找到更好的货。但你欠我的。别忘了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaStash5_00005F16_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any thoughts?
Nice ass. I'd love to see you shake it some time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好翘的屁股。我真想什么时候看你摇摆一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_0000803E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you... wet right now? Seriously?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你…现在就湿了?认真的吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_0000803F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, your dick is tiny. Look at that little guy, it's like he's scared and shrivelled up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，你的鸡巴真小。看那个小家伙，他好像吓坏了，缩成一团。
