ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008040_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just try and get my clothes off. I dare you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 试着把我的衣服脱了。你敢不敢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008041_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm staring at your eyes. Really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在盯着你的眼睛。真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008042_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What I'm thinking is why the fuck you want to talk right now. We have a job to do!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在正在想的是你他妈到底想聊什么？ 我们有活要干！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008043_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now ain't the time, gringo!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008044_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's stay on this side of the bars, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们就待在吧台这边吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008045_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at this place... it's dustier than a nun's cooch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看这个地方...比修女的教具还脏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008514_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh joy. Legion turf.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008515_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look around... this is all the Great Republic can muster. The Dam's gonna be a bloodbath.
ESP.TRADUIT: 环顾四周...这是伟大的共和国所能做到的。大坝会是一场血战。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008516_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ride and die, huh? I can respect that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同生共死，是吗？我尊重这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008517_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, Trudy's still kicking! That old hag tossed me out of here once.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，特鲁迪还在蹦跶！那个老巫婆曾经把我赶出这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008518_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget the Legion... I'd be more likely to die of boredom out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 忘记军团吧...我在这里更有可能死于无聊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008519_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Best to stock up now. We've still got a long way to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最好现在就囤货。我们还有很长的路要走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_0000851A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me a flamer. Or, better yet, a big fucking bomb.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我一个喷火器。或者，更好的是，一个他妈的大炸弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_0000851B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Enclave? Who the hell are they? Some old world boogeyman?
ESP.TRADUIT: 英克雷?他们到底是谁?旧世界的妖怪?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_0000851C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Khan territory. Great.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_0000851D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You gotta give them credit... no matter how many trains are raided, the company keeps on going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得给他们点赞...不管有多少列火车被洗劫，这家公司仍在继续运营。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_0000851E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This stuff is top of the line, but it costs just as much. Almost got away with a shipment once.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这东西是顶级的，但价格也一样高。有一次差点就成功运走一批货了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_0000851F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes... let's waste our time giving alms to the poor and desperate. Makes me want to puke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的...让我们把时间浪费在施舍穷人和绝望的人身上吧。让我想吐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008520_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The sweet smell of alcohol and desperation. Pity someone won't take away the mic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 酒精的甜香和绝望的气息。可惜没人拿走麦克风。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008521_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happens at Gomorrah stays at Gomorrah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在蛾摩拉发生的事就让它留在蛾摩拉吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008522_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bunch of wackjobs, if you ask me... but they're harmless enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你问我，我会说一群怪人...但它们是无害的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008523_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe that kid'll finally shut up now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许那孩子终于该闭嘴了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008524_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know what's worse: the fact they have some building here to begin with, or they think it'll change anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道哪个更糟是他们在这里建了一栋楼，还是他们认为这能改变一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008525_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, no... we're not doing this again. Mierda...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦,不...我们不能再这样了。妈的...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008526_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone needs to do the world a favour and put a bullet in those two. Hell, vaporise them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 得有人帮这个世界一个忙，朝那两个人开一枪。见鬼，让他们蒸发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008527_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the Tops, but where's the colosseum?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是九重天，但是斗兽场在哪里?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008528_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place is too rich for my blood. Let 'em stare... like I give a shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方对我来说太富饶了。让他们盯着看...好像我在乎似的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008529_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, we haven't been blown up yet. That's... something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我们还没被炸飞，这...也算是个好消息吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_0000852A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood's still kicking? Mierda.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_0000852B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear you're some kind of courier. Mojave Express, right? What, the demand for postcards is really that high out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你是个快递员。莫哈韦快递，对吧？怎么，这里的明信片需求量真的那么高吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_0000852C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you got shot in the head just trying to deliver a package, I can only imagine what'll kill you next. A strong breeze, maybe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你只是送了个包裹就被射中头部，那我只能想象接下来还有什么能杀死你了。一阵强风？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008046_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Khans are a bunch of pretentious asswipes. You ask me, they got what they deserved at Bitter Springs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大汗帮是一群自命不凡的混蛋。要我说，他们在苦泉镇罪有应得。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008047_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd think the NCR would've wised up by now and gone home, but no... still stuck here with their heads in the sand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为NCR到现在应该已经明智地回家了，但是没有...他们仍然在这里把头埋在沙子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008048_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're looking for a real high, try mixing ayahuasca with Hydra... you can feel every little sensation down to the bone. Beautiful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想要真的爽一下，就试试把死藤水和九头蛇混在一起...你可以感觉到骨头里每一个微小的感觉。太美了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008049_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I fucking hate Nightkin. Jumpy bastards are even crazier than Fiends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈的讨厌夜行者。神经质的混蛋比恶魔帮还疯狂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_0000804A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever seen a sunset in the Baja? Nothing else like it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在巴哈见过日落吗?这是独一无二的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_0000804B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever wanna try your luck at the tables, be my guest. We used to cut off the fingers of anyone who cheated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想在赌桌上碰碰运气，随你便。我们以前会把作弊人的手指砍掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_0000804C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most wastelanders are scared of their own shadow. Puta... they'd sooner make a break for it than risk a shootout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数废土人都怕自己的影子。混蛋..他们宁愿逃跑也不愿冒险开枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_0000804D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are worse ways to die than a bullet to the head. Much worse... you should see what the Omertas do to informants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有比一枪爆头更糟糕的死法。更糟...你应该看看黑手党是怎么对待告密者的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_0000804E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: House never did play fair... Securitrons are a pain in the ass to take down. Use EMP or, better, explosives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 豪斯从来不玩公平的游戏...保安机器人很难被干掉。使用EMP，或者更好的话，用爆炸物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_0000804F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? I got something on my face?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008050_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think Deathclaws are nasty? You should hear the stories coming out of the Bayou in the east.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得死亡爪很恶心？你应该听听东部沼泽的故事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008051_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guns are nice and all, but you can't beat that feeling of a good chainsaw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 枪是不错，但没什么能比得过一把好链锯带来的感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008052_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Spikes and a dress might not be worth much to a suit of that powered shit, but a lady's gotta have some style...
ESP.TRADUIT: 尖刺和裙子对于那一套动力装备来说可能不值一提，但女士总得有点风格...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008053_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing. Well, other than putting my feet up by the fire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么事，除了把脚搁在火堆旁边烤烤火。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008054_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Best advice for fighting indoors: flank 'em. Most don't expect a shotgun at point blank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 室内战斗的最佳建议：从侧翼攻击他们。大多数人都不希望在近距离被霰弹枪击中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008055_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever gonna pay me for this? Mierda...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008056_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once saw a Jackal pull herself naked out of a Brahmin carcass. Loco.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一次，我看到一个豺狼帮的从双头牛尸体里赤身裸体地爬出来。疯子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008057_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might come as a surprise, but most raiders aren't keen on sharing. Makes them easier to exploit that way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可能让你觉得惊讶，但大多数掠夺者都不喜欢分享。这样更容易利用他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008058_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm bored. Let's go find something to kill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很无聊。我们去找点东西干掉吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008059_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I have to listen to another yokel singing about a broken heart, I'm gonna explode. That Mr. New Vegas has a pretty sexy voice though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我还得再听一个土包子唱关于心碎的歌，我就得疯了。不过那位新维加斯先生嗓音真性感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_0000805A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nada.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_0000852D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not your fortune teller.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_0000852E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not now, gringo. Stop pestering me with questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在不行，美国佬。别再用问题烦我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_0000852F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am nowhere near drunk or high enough for this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还没醉，也没嗨到喝这个的程度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaThoughts_00008530_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on. Let's keep moving.
Let's rock!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaGoodbye_000085E1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's kick 'em back into the sea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们把他们踢回海里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaGoodbye_000085E2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Too much of you's moving already...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaGoodbye_000085E3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just... stay in front of me.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaGoodbye_000085E4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did I join up with you again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我为何又和你搭上线了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaGoodbye_000085E5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaGoodbye_000085E6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mierda... now my leg's starting to cramp...
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的...现在我的腿开始抽筋了…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaGoodbye_000085E7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So much for the quiet approach.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安静的潜入方法没戏了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaGoodbye_000085E8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take it away.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaGoodbye_000085E9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Age before beauty, right?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaGoodbye_000085EA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's go stir up some trouble.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaGoodbye_000085EB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucking hell... I could use a hit right about now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的...我现在需要来点儿刺激的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaGoodbye_000085EC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, it's not like I have anything better to do.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaGoodbye_000085ED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rock n' roll.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaGoodbye_000085EE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We gonna do this, or what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们到底要不要这么做?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaGoodbye_000085EF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still with you. Mostly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在你身边，大部分时候都在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaGoodbye_000085F0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't thrown my lot in with anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还没有和任何人结盟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sure about that? You seem to be all buddy-buddy with those guys... and I don't see anyone else running round in sports gear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定吗？你似乎和那些人很亲近...而且我也没看见其他人穿着运动装备到处跑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaFacA1A_00009420_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you have a problem with that?
Nope... not really. To be honest, I just thought you could do better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有...并不是。说实话，我只是觉得你还能做得更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaFacA1B_00009422_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ave, true to Caesar.
See, now you just sound like a psycho... who the hell speaks Latin nowadays anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，你现在听起来就像一个疯子...现在谁还会说拉丁语？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaFacA2A_00009424_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do whatever you want, just don't get me crucified alongside you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随你怎么做，只是别让我和你一起被钉在十字架上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaFacA2A_00009424_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're a means to an end, nothing more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们只是达到目的的手段，仅此而已。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I'm saying is, you'd better watch your back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想说的是，你最好小心点儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaFacA2B_00009426_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, you're all best friends now but as soon as you're no longer of use, watch you don't end up the same way as their leader.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，你们现在是好朋友，但一旦你不再有用，小心别落得和他们的头儿一样的下场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaFacA2B_00009426_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you talking about?
Hey, if you wanna get all choked up at the flag, that's your choice. But the army and I have... some history.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，如果你想对国旗敬礼到哽咽，那是你的选择。但我和军队之间...有些渊源。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaFacB1_00009428_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not trying to convince you, if that's what you're asking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这是你的疑问，那么我并不是想说服你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good... I never was one for uniform. Just watch the red tape doesn't pull you down with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好...我从不随波逐流。只要别让官僚作风把你拖垮了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaFacB2A_0000942A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR is flawed, but it's our best hope. Only hope.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR是有缺陷的，但它是我们最好的希望。唯一的希望。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So said every little upstart since the dawn of time. We're still here, ain't we? Even after the bombs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有史以来，每一个小暴发户都这么说。我们还在这里，不是吗？甚至在核弹之后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaFacB2B_0000942C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mierda... listen to me ramble. This is why I stay away from all the politics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死...听我瞎扯。这就是为什么我要远离政治。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaFacB2B_0000942C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you be a bit more specific?
If you want to go all bleeding heart, fine, but I'll find something else to do. And shoot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你真的同情心泛滥，那没问题，但我会找其他事做。还有开枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaFacC1_0000942E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know who's crazier: these Followers for thinking they can actually make a difference, or you for joining them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道谁更疯狂：这些信徒认为他们真的可以改变什么，还是你加入他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaFacC1_0000942E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't joined them, Rosa. I did some jobs, that's it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有加入他们，罗莎。我只是做了一些工作，仅此而已。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't seem that way from where I'm standing, but whatever. Just don't expect me to listen when you start pulling out a Bible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但在我看来，并不是这么回事，不过无所谓了。只是，当你开始拿出圣经的时候，别指望我会听。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaFacC2A_00009430_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every little bit matters, no matter how small.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论多小，每一个细节都很重要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Psshh... you'd have more luck counting every grain of sand in the Mojave. All this weak charity shit makes me sick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗤，你去数莫哈韦沙漠的每一粒沙子，都比这更有可能成功。这些微不足道的慈善之举让我感到恶心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaFacC2B_00009432_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're just angry because you've already given up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只是因为你已经放弃了才生气。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Given up? Given up?! Fuck off... you have no right to lecture me, gringo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放弃了？放弃了？！滚开...你没资格教训我，美国佬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaFacC2C_00009434_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wanna strut around and pretend things're all fine and dandy, that's on you. I've got my rifle ready when that doesn't work out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想趾高气扬地假装一切都很好，那就随你的便。如果这行不通，我已经准备好了步枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([04005F09]RosaQuest) G E N E R I C EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaQuest_RosaFacC2C_00009434_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is something wrong?
What? N-no nothing's wrong... mierda. I'm no good with this stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么啦？不，没事…妈的。我不擅长做这种事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainA1_0000A89E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Relax. Take your time.
I-- thanks.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainA2A_0000A8A0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's this? The great lady Rosa, stunned into silence?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么？尊贵的罗莎女士，被惊得说不出话来了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, yeah... laugh it up. I might have to punch you at this rate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧...尽情嘲笑吧。照这个速度下去，我可能会揍你一顿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainA2B_0000A8A2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well? We don't have all day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么样？我们可没一整天的时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, this... ain't easy.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainA2C_0000A8A4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is it about the Fiends?
Bingo. If we're going after Cook-Cook, I want to be the one to kill him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了。如果我们要去找大厨库克，我想亲手杀了他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainA3_0000A8A6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This wasn't how I thought it'd go down, but that doesn't matter now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没想到事情会这样发展，但现在已经不重要了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainA3_0000A8A6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why? I thought you two would be friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么？我以为你们两个是朋友呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Friends? That good-for-nothing coños' only friends are those brahmin he mounts every night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 朋友？那没用家伙唯一的朋友，就是他每晚骑的那些双头牛罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainA4_0000A8A8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell, even Motor-Runner was smart enough to keep him away. He's like a mad dog. Rabid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，连机车手都比他聪明，离他远远的。他就像一条疯狗，发狂了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainA4_0000A8A8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened between you two?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们俩之间到底发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't matter. What matters is that I'm gonna kill him and you're gonna help me do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。重要的是，我要杀了他，而你要帮我完成这件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainA5_0000A8AA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you think of me, the Fiends, hell, the whole fucking wasteland, this guy's gotta go. It's... important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管你怎么看我，恶魔帮，地狱，整个该死的废土，这家伙都得死。这是...很重要的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainA5_0000A8AA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then let's go get him.
Gracias, amigo. Look, I know I'm not the easiest to be around, but this is something we need to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，朋友。我知道我这个人不好相处，但这件事我们必须要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainA6A_0000A8AC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll consider it.
You do that.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainA6B_0000A8AE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's over.
Sí... that it is. I'd piss on his corpse, but that coño isn't even worth the effort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这...这就是结果。我想朝他的尸体吐口唾沫，但这人甚至不配我费这份力气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainB1_0000B22C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do whatever you want with the head. He's done, that's all that matters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想怎么处置他的脑袋都行。他已经死了，这才是最重要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainB1_0000B22C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The wasteland will be a little bit safer now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在这片废土会稍微安全一些了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't do this for anyone else. Someone'll eventually take his place before they get killed too. It doesn't matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这么做不是为了别人。在他们被杀之前，总会有人取代他的位置。这无所谓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainB2A_0000B22E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We should turn this in before it starts to stink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们应该在它开始发臭之前把它交上去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's all yours... I don't even wanna touch that. Throw it to the coyotes to play with for all I care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 都是你的了...我甚至不想碰它。随便扔给土狼玩去吧，我才不在乎呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainB2B_0000B230_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you feeling all right?
Hmph. Better than I've ever been, actually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。事实上，比我任何时候都好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainB3_0000B232_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you what, next time we're near Boulder City, we should drop by the Big Horn Saloon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样吧，下次我们在巨石城附近的时候，应该顺便去大角沙龙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainB3_0000B232_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's an old rundown bar that doesn't get many people coming through. I wouldn't mind putting my feet up there again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是一个老旧破败的酒吧，没什么人光顾。我不介意再去那里放松一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainB3_0000B232_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Motion for some drinks while retrieving the caps from your pack.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [从包里取出瓶盖时，顺便拿了些酒。]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ahhh... all in all, not a bad place for a cerveza, huh? Found it by chance actually, I stumbled in after getting shot through the leg.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，总的来说，这是个喝啤酒的好地方，不是吗？其实，我是偶然间发现这里的，我腿上挨了一枪后跌跌撞撞地闯进来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainC1_0000BBAB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're in a good mood.
And why not! Do I scare you, gringo... can't a lady crack a smile every now and then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不呢！我吓到你了吗，美国佬...难道女人就不能时不时地笑一下吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainC2A_0000BBAD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, in all the time we've travelled together, I barely know anything about you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗，我们一路同行这么久，我几乎对你一无所知。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Probably cause there's not much to tell. Who wants to hear about some chica from the Baja?
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能是因为没什么好说的。谁想听一个来自巴哈的小妞的故事?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainC2B_0000BBAF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something must have brought you to the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一定有什么事情让你来到莫哈维沙漠。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ain't got some sob story for you, if that's what you're fishing for. The Khans like to act tough, but they're nothing like living off the mesas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你是在打探什么伤心往事，我可没什么好说的。大汗帮的人喜欢装腔作势，但他们可不像生活在高原上的人那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainC3_0000BBB1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You came here alone?
Something like that. No Legion round then, of course... tribes rose and fell with the wind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 差不多就是这样。当然，那时候没有军团...部族们如同风云一般崛起与衰亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainC4_0000BBB3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you end up falling in with the Fiends?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么会沦落到和恶魔帮为伍的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not that different to any other kid. Dumb, angry, looking for our next lot of caps...
ESP.TRADUIT: 和其他孩子没什么不同。愚蠢、愤怒，寻找下一批瓶盖...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainC5_0000BBB5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, I'd love to tell you that I was there from the beginning, that Motor and Violet looked up to me like a big sister, but I never was one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想说，我很想告诉你我从一开始就在那里，莫托和维奥莱特都把我当作大姐姐看待，但我从来都不是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainC5_0000BBB5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR occasionally sent patrols which were easy pickings, but the raider life isn't as fun as you think.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR偶尔派出巡逻队，这些巡逻队很容易成为猎物，但劫掠者的生活并不像你想的那么有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainC5_0000BBB5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, you get people that want to tear out some waster's guts with a coat hanger or make a necklace out of eyeballs, but those don't last.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，有些人想用衣架把废物的内脏挖出来，或者用眼球做成项链，但那些都不会长久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainC5_0000BBB5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mmm... now you're just making me hungry.
No shit, really? I had wondered why you always get blood on your face. It's your business though, I don't care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？我还纳闷你脸上怎么总有血呢。不过那是你的事，我无所谓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainC6A_0000BBB7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What changed?
Good times, bad times... you know the drill. I don't know if any of us changed, more that it was inevitable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好时光，坏时光...你知道的。我不知道我们中是否有人改变，但更多的改变是不可避免的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainC6B_0000BBB9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everyone's got a line they won't cross, only so much they can take. Most learn that the hard way... why do you think most raiders love chems?
ESP.TRADUIT: 每个人都有自己的底线，他们不会越过那条线，他们也有自己的极限。大多数人都是通过痛苦的方式才明白这一点...你知道为什么大多数掠夺者都爱用化学药品？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainC6B_0000BBB9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're speaking from experience.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是从经验中得出的结论。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe... or maybe it's just the alcohol.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许...也可能只是酒精的作用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainC7_0000BBBB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, after things went down with Cook-Cook and the others couldn't stand to look at each other, there was no way I was sticking around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，大厨库克出事后，其他人无法忍受彼此，我无论如何也不会待在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainC7_0000BBBB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's it, really. Been out here ever since, at least until you came along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这样，真的。从那以后我就一直在这里，至少直到你出现为止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainC7_0000BBBB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for telling me.
Ha, don't get used to it! But you're not half-bad for company either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈，别习惯了！不过有你在身边也不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainC8_0000BBBD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me ask you something: do you regret anything you did as a raider?
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我问你一个问题：你后悔作为一个掠夺者所做的任何事情吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh... guess you're just gonna come right out and say it. I mean, it sounds like you've already made up your mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵呵...我猜你会直截了当地说出来。我的意思是，听起来你已经下定了决心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainC9A_0000BBBF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But no, I don't... maybe that makes me as bad as the rest of them. Maybe I'm a monster in your eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但不，我没有...也许这让我和他们一样糟糕。也许在你眼里我是个怪物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainC9A_0000BBBF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I don't give a shit, amigo. I really, really don't care. Life hasn't given either of us that luxury.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我不在乎，朋友。我真的，真的不在乎。生活没有给我们任何奢侈的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainC9A_0000BBBF_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As long as the liquor holds up, we can do this till morning!
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要酒能撑得住，我们就可以干到早上！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now we're talking! Salud!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我们开始说话了!干杯!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainC9B_0000BBC1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To you, Rosa.
And you, jaina.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainC9C_0000BBC3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you, muchacho.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0400A899]RosaMain) Last Dance EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaMain_RosaMainC9C_0000BBC4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh my god, oh my god, oh my god! I've only seen dresses like that in my dreams!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的天，我的天，我的天!我只在梦里见过那样的裙子!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\RosaConvs_RosaConvsVA1_0000C53B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like it, huh? Tell you what, chica... keep this up and I could get one for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喜欢它，对吧？告诉你吧，小妞...保持这个状态，我可以给你买一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsVA2_0000C53D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just don't ever ask me if your outfit makes you look fat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 千万别问我这身衣服会不会让你看起来胖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\RosaConvs_RosaConvsVA3_0000C53F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha. You got a deal.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsVA4_0000C541_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... you're one of the Brotherhood? You don't seem the type.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以…你是兄弟会的一员?你看起来不像那种人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsVB1_0000C543_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should've left a long time ago.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\RosaConvs_RosaConvsVB2_0000C545_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You stuck around with your people. That's gotta be worth be something... just don't let 'em pull you down too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和你的同胞们在一起。那肯定是值得的...只是别让他们把你拖垮了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsVB3_0000C547_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. Yeah. Thought as much.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\RosaConvs_RosaConvsVB4_0000C549_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Veronica.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsVC1_0000C54B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's up?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\RosaConvs_RosaConvsVC2_0000C54D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're doing that thing again... it's giving me a headache.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsVC3_0000C54F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooo. Sorry.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\FemaleUniqueVeronica\RosaConvs_RosaConvsVC4_0000C551_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry about it. Just... relax, hermana. You're making me nervous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心。只是…放松,姐妹。你让我很紧张。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsVC5_0000C553_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got my eye on you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raul [000E60EF] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\GhoulUniqueRaul\RosaConvs_RosaConvsRA1_0000C555_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Relax, pinche. You're gonna blow a gasket like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放松,该死。你那样会气炸的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsRA2_0000C557_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I get killed, I'll haunt your ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我被杀了，我会缠着你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raul [000E60EF] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\GhoulUniqueRaul\RosaConvs_RosaConvsRA3_0000C559_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right back at you. So let's just focus on the road, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 彼此彼此。我们还是把注意力放在路上吧，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsRA4_0000C55B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not too bad for a bag of bones. Gonna keep up the fight, hermano?
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为一个皮包骨，你还不赖。要继续战斗吗，伙计?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsRB1_0000C55D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That makes me feel young again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这让我觉得自己又年轻了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raul [000E60EF] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\GhoulUniqueRaul\RosaConvs_RosaConvsRB2_0000C55F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And how many centuries has that been, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那都过了多少个世纪了?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsRB3_0000C561_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would it surprise you to know that I used to be a gunslinging adventurer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我说自己曾经是一个流浪枪手，你会不会有点吃惊？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raul [000E60EF] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\GhoulUniqueRaul\RosaConvs_RosaConvsRB4_0000C563_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, yeah... kinda. We should put that to the test sometime. Drinks on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说，是的...有点。我们应该找个时间来测试一下。酒我请。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsRB5_0000C565_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you say.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raul [000E60EF] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\GhoulUniqueRaul\RosaConvs_RosaConvsRB6_0000C567_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did I hear right? You said you came from Mexico City?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没听错吧?你说你来自墨西哥城?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsRC1_0000C569_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was born just outside Mexico City. My family had a little ranch there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我生在墨西哥城外。我的父母经营了一个小农场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raul [000E60EF] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\GhoulUniqueRaul\RosaConvs_RosaConvsRC2_0000C56B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you came all this way north? Mierda... what for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还千里迢迢跑到这么北的地方来？妈的...为了什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsRC3_0000C56D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just how old do you think I am?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Raul [000E60EF] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\GhoulUniqueRaul\RosaConvs_RosaConvsRC4_0000C56F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, old enough to keep fighting. That's good enough for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，年纪够大，可以继续战斗。这对我来说就足够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsRC5_0000C571_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looking for trouble? Got no time for gawkers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找麻烦吗？没时间理你们这些闲人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\FemaleUniqueCass\RosaConvs_RosaConvsCA1_0000C573_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take a breath, jaina. You got a nasty look in your eye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰安娜，深呼吸。你的眼神很凶狠。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsCA2_0000C575_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, let's focus on the bad guys.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，还是专心对付坏蛋吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\FemaleUniqueCass\RosaConvs_RosaConvsCA3_0000C577_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Works for me.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsCA4_0000C579_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eyes up!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsCB1_0000C57B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You expecting a fight?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\FemaleUniqueCass\RosaConvs_RosaConvsCB2_0000C57D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I just wanted to see if the Rose was quick on the draw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我只是想看看罗莎的反应快不快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsCB3_0000C57F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gonna six this bitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把这个婊子大卸八块。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\FemaleUniqueCass\RosaConvs_RosaConvsCB4_0000C581_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, I knew you loved me.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsCB5_0000C583_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that your sour face I see, Cass? What, a gal can't help our friend out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到你板着脸了，卡西？怎么了，一个女孩就不能帮我们的朋友吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsCC1_0000C585_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's your excuse?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\FemaleUniqueCass\RosaConvs_RosaConvsCC2_0000C587_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, if I knew you were such a big fan of the Fiends, I would've invited you right in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，早知道你是恶魔帮的超级粉丝，我早就邀请你进来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsCC3_0000C589_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you fucking high right now? God, I can smell that shit from here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在嗑药了吗?天啊，我在这都能闻到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cass [00133FDD] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\FemaleUniqueCass\RosaConvs_RosaConvsCC4_0000C58B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should try it, chica. Might relax that scowl of yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该试试，小妞。也许能让你那紧锁的眉头放松一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsCC5_0000C58D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, army boy. What crawled up your ass, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，当兵的。什么东西爬到你屁股上了?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsBA1_0000C58F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My wife was taken while I was on watch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我妻子在我值班时被抓走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\MaleUniqueCraigBoone\RosaConvs_RosaConvsBA2_0000C591_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah yes, Legion, right? Can't imagine they left much of her when they were finished.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，是的，军团，对吧？我猜他们结束后也没留给她多少东西了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsBA3_0000C593_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're done talking.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\MaleUniqueCraigBoone\RosaConvs_RosaConvsBA4_0000C595_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guy like you could get any posting in the Republic. Why the Mojave? Hell, why not keep fighting?
ESP.TRADUIT: 像你这样的人在共和国能得到任何职务， 为何会到莫哈韦来？更别说为何不继续打仗了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsBB1_0000C597_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My leaving the NCR hasn't stopped any wars or saved any lives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我离开NCR并没有停止任何战争，也没有拯救任何生命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\MaleUniqueCraigBoone\RosaConvs_RosaConvsBB2_0000C599_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget the heroics, you want the caps, right? Why not get paid for mowing down the Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 别逞英雄了，你想要瓶盖，对吧？为什么不为铲除军团赚点瓶盖呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsBB3_0000C59B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not always that simple.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\MaleUniqueCraigBoone\RosaConvs_RosaConvsBB4_0000C59D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're talking about killing people. It's always that simple.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在谈论杀人。这总是那么简单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsBB5_0000C59F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice of you to show up.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\MaleUniqueCraigBoone\RosaConvs_RosaConvsBC1_0000C5A1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I'm always down for some killing. And a good fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我随时都准备大开杀戒。来场精彩的战斗也不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsBC2_0000C5A3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your enemies, or mine?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boone [00092BD2] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\MaleUniqueCraigBoone\RosaConvs_RosaConvsBC3_0000C5A5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Point and shoot, army boy. Don't overthink it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 指哪打哪，当兵的，别想太多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsBC4_0000C5A7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh. Sorry.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Arcade Gannon [0010C767] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\MaleUniqueArcade\RosaConvs_RosaConvsAA1_0000C5A9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you relax? You're pissing me off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能不能放松点？你把我惹毛了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsAA2_0000C5AB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Safety first.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Arcade Gannon [0010C767] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\MaleUniqueArcade\RosaConvs_RosaConvsAA3_0000C5AD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, this is what I mean. You need to relax... mierda...
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，我就是这个意思。你需要放松...见鬼...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsAA4_0000C5AF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... what's your angle in all this? Followers or what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么...你在这其中扮演什么角色？是追随者还是别的什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsAB1_0000C5B1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a hard question to answer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个很难回答的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Arcade Gannon [0010C767] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\MaleUniqueArcade\RosaConvs_RosaConvsAB2_0000C5B3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's really not. Are you gonna save everyone you can, or you gonna actually fight? At least someone's getting things done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这真不是。你是打算拯救你所能拯救的每一个人，还是要真正去战斗？至少有人在做事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsAB3_0000C5B5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How noble of you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Arcade Gannon [0010C767] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\MaleUniqueArcade\RosaConvs_RosaConvsAB4_0000C5B7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Psshhh... nobility has nothing to do with it.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsAB5_0000C5B9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still breathing there, cabrón? You might've even got a papercut back there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还在喘气吗，伙计？你可能连被纸割伤都没有呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsAC1_0000C5BB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the words of Socrates, "Go fornicate yourself."
ESP.TRADUIT: 照苏格拉底的话，"自己去行淫吧。"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Arcade Gannon [0010C767] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\MaleUniqueArcade\RosaConvs_RosaConvsAC2_0000C5BD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're gonna make a proper warrior out of you yet. Just you wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们总有一天会让你成为一位真正的战士的，你就等着吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsAC3_0000C5BF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mmhmm.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Arcade Gannon [0010C767] (file) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\MaleUniqueArcade\RosaConvs_RosaConvsAC4_0000C5C1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You naughty, naughty girl!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0013D834] (ID) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\CreatureUniqueLily\RosaConvs_RosaConvsLA1_0000C5C3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Woah, woah... easy there, mama. You're a little too much for me to handle, eh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦，哇哦...悠着点儿，妈妈。你有点让我招架不住了，是吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsLA2_0000C5C5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice puppies...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0013D834] (ID) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\CreatureUniqueLily\RosaConvs_RosaConvsLA3_0000C5C7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, why are you staring at my breasts? Stop that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么盯着我的奶子看？别这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsLA4_0000C5C9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, hello? Anyone home?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsLB1_0000C5CB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you got a hug for me, cutie-pie?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0013D834] (ID) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\CreatureUniqueLily\RosaConvs_RosaConvsLB2_0000C5CD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm good... definitely, definitely good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我很好...当然，当然很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsLB3_0000C5CF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Such a curious little munchkin, aren't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是个好奇的小矮人，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0013D834] (ID) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\CreatureUniqueLily\RosaConvs_RosaConvsLB4_0000C5D1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Munchkin? Hey, lady-- Actually, you know what, never mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小矮人？嘿，女士——其实，算了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsLB5_0000C5D3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You shouldn't be so mean to people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不应该对人那么刻薄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0013D834] (ID) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\CreatureUniqueLily\RosaConvs_RosaConvsLC1_0000C5D5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, this from the Super Mutant?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，这是超级变种人的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsLC2_0000C5D7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the matter? Afraid grandma will embarrass you in front of your little friends?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？怕奶奶在你小朋友面前让你难堪？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0013D834] (ID) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\CreatureUniqueLily\RosaConvs_RosaConvsLC3_0000C5D9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is way too crazy for a lecture. Let's just... move on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这太疯狂了，不适合演讲。我们还是...继续吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rosa [0400176C] (mod) Quest : ([0400C080]RosaConvs) B A N T E R EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\voice\Rosa.esp\RosaVT\RosaConvs_RosaConvsLC4_0000C5DB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: By Any Other Name
Speak with the raider at Ivanpah Dry Lake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在伊凡帕旱湖与掠夺者交谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Resolve the situation.
Decide the fate of the hostage.
Decide the fate of the raider.
Last Dance
Hunt down Cook-Cook in the New Vegas ruins with Rosa.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和罗莎一起在新维加斯废墟中寻找库克大厨。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with Rosa.
Travel to the Big Horn Saloon in Boulder City.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往巨石城的大角沙龙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Femme Fatality
Hit 'em where it hurts. With Rosa at your side, you deal 20% more critical damage. You also regenerate Action Points faster.
ESP.TRADUIT: 攻击敌人的弱点。有罗莎在旁，你的暴击伤害增加20%。你的行动点数恢复速度也会更快。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You notice the doctor's hands are tied.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你注意到医生的双手被绑住了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Untie
Talk
Close
Rosa has died.
Rosa has returned to Gomorrah.
Rosa has returned to the Lucky 38.
Rosa has given you the Femme Fatality perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 罗莎给了你致命女神特长。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have lost Rosa's Femme Fatality perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经失去了罗莎的致命女神特长。
